ADC_DMAMSAR.description:
ADC DMA memory start address
          register

ADC_DMANDTR.description:
ADC DMA number of data to transfer
          register

ADC_DMAMNAR.description:
ADC DMA memory next address
          register

ADC_DMACNDTR.description:
ADC DMA count number of data transferred
          register

RST.description:
Write 1 to reset the ADC
              DMA

TUNE.description:
Frequency trim setting for HF RC
              oscillator

MODE.description:
Sets clock to be measured by
              CLK_PERIOD

EN.description:
MHz crystal oscillator is main
              clock

GPIO.description:
Enable filter on GPIO wakeup sources
              enabled by the PWR_WAKEPxR registers

SC1.description:
Enable filter on GPIO wakeup source SC1
              (PB2)

SC2.description:
Enable filter on GPIO wakeup source SC2
              (PA2)

IRQD.description:
Enable filter on GPIO wakeup source EXTI
              D

INTLINESNUM.description:
Total number of interrupt lines in
              groups

SC1_DMARXBEGADDAR.description:
Serial controller receive DMA begin address
          channel A register

SC1_DMARXENDADDAR.description:
Serial controller receive DMA end address
          channel A register

SC1_DMARXBEGADDBR.description:
Serial controller receive DMA begin address
          channel B register

SC1_DMARXENDADDBR.description:
Serial controller receive DMA end address
          channel B register

SC1_DMATXBEGADDAR.description:
Serial controller transmit DMA begin address
          channel A register

SC1_DMATXENDADDAR.description:
Serial controller transmit DMA end address
          channel A register

SC1_DMATXBEGADDBR.description:
Serial controller transmit DMA begin address
          channel B register

SC1_DMATXENDADDBR.description:
Serial controller transmit DMA end address
          channel B

SC1_DMARXCNTAR.description:
Serial controller receive DMA counter
          channel A register

SC1_DMARXCNTBR.description:
Serial controller receive DMA count channel
          B register

SC1_DMATXCNTR.description:
Serial controller transmit DMA counter
          register

SC1_DMARXERRAR.description:
Serial controller receive DMA channel A
          first error register

SC1_DMARXERRBR.description:
Serial controller receive DMA channel B
          first error register

SC1_DMARXCNTSAVEDR.description:
Serial controller receive DMA saved counter
          channel B register

SC1_UARTBRR1.description:
Serial controller UART baud rate register
          1

SC1_UARTBRR2.description:
Serial controller UART baud rate register
          2
